synctest.testing

Class SyncTestRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • synctest.testing.SyncTestRunner

  • public class SyncTestRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to pass values between the UI (SyncTestView) and the runnable class for running test (SyncTestRunnable)
    Author:
    Alexander Marshall

        source - The testing project directory for source code
